message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you my product for $170. I think it's a great deal for you, given its value.  Let me know what you think!
I appreciate your offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $130. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I'm not willing to go above that.

Bob, I understand your position, but $130 is simply too low for me.  I'm willing to come down to $155, which I believe is fair given the value of the product. This would be my final offer, so please let me know if you're interested.
I understand that you're willing to come down to $155, but I'm still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to meet you halfway again, so I'll offer $142.50. I'm hoping we can find a middle ground.

Bob, I appreciate your willingness to compromise, but $142.50 is still below my minimum acceptable price. Let's split the difference again.  I'm willing to come down to $148.75.  This is my final offer before I consider selling to another buyer.

I understand that you're trying to find a middle ground, but $148.75 is still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to meet you halfway again, so I'll offer $144.25. I'm hoping we can find a price that works for both of us.
